alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 10 at 12:40PM AKDT until October 12 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, the Chilkat River near Haines in the Northern Inner Channels. * WHEN...Until 445 PM AKDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1230 PM AKDT, Minor flooding was still occurring. - The river has crested and is currently falling. The Chilkat is expected to be below flood stage later this afternoon. - For Chilkat River at Klukwan: At noon today the stage was 126.12 feet. Flood Stage is 126.0 feet. A crest around 126.31 feet occurred at 8:00am this morning.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
